definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

pinyin: yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1
yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1 zheng4

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of the intervertebral space infection after lumbar operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腰椎间盘术后椎间隙感染的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Results One of important causes is thecervical and lumbar herniated disc.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现颈腰椎间盘突出症是本病的重要原因。

sentences.english: Objective:To discuss clinical characteristic and treatment of silent lumbar disc herniation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨隐匿型腰椎间盘突出症的诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the double-interventional therapy of lumbar intervertebral disc herniation (LIDH) in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨双介入方法对老年腰椎间盘突出症的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of far-infrared thermal graphs for the diagnosis of lumbar disc herniation(LDH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨用远红外热像图诊断腰椎间盘突出症的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of lumbar disc herniation with lumbar instability.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腰椎间盘突出症合并腰椎不稳的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of intervertebral space infection after lumbar operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腰椎间盘术后椎间隙感染的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Enough of diagnosing lumbar muscle strain lumbar disc herniation and pathological changes.
sentences.chinese: 解晰腰肌劳损及腰椎间盘突出的病因诊断及病理改变。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the CT features of lumbar intervertebral disc degenerations a nd its diagnostic value.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腰椎间盘退变的CT表现及诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the results of conservative treatments of lumbar disc herniation in communities.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨在社区非手术治疗腰椎间盘突出症的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the curative effect of conservative treatment for prolapse of lumbar intervertebral disc.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析保守疗法治疗腰椎间盘突出症的疗效。

sentences.english: Lumbar disc arthroplasty, however, engenders a separate set of concerns.
sentences.chinese: 然而，人们对腰椎间盘成形术产生了一系列的担忧。

sentences.english: Interventional therapy should be the first choice for the treatment of the postoperative lumbar discitis.
sentences.chinese: 可作为腰椎间盘炎治疗时优先考虑的方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the necessity of treating prolapse of lumbar intervertebral disc by active movement treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨主动运动治疗腰椎间盘突出症的临床疗效。

sentences.english: The Biomechanical Relation ship Between Prolapse of Lumbar Intervertebral Disc and Spondylolisthesis and Operative Treatment.
sentences.chinese: 腰椎间盘突出与脊椎滑脱的力学关系和手术选择。

sentences.english: The clinical analysis of vertebral posterior marginal osseous mass-typedisease concomitantprolapse of lumbar intervertebral disc.
sentences.chinese: 椎体后缘骨块类疾病伴腰椎间盘突出临床分析。

definition: cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
